price: Maka berjalanlah keduanya hingga tatkala keduanya menaiki perahu, lalu Khiḍr melubanginya.  Musa berkata, "Mengapa kamu melubangi perahu itu yang akibatnya kamu menenggelamkan penumpangnya?" Sesungguhnya kamu telah berbuat sesuatu kesalahan yang besar.
arabic: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِي ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَاۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقۡتَهَا لِتُغۡرِقَ أَهۡلَهَا لَقَدۡ جِئۡتَ شَيۡـًٔا إِمۡرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-inṭalaqā ḥattā idhā rakibā fī al-safīnati kharaqahā qāla akharaqtahā litugh'riqa ahlahā laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
translations: he made a hole in it
Have you made a hole in it
